content.text:
# Maratha–Rajput Wars

Maratha–Rajput Wars refers to a series of conflicts between the Maratha Confederacy and the various Rajput states in the eighteenth century:
*Battle of Pilsud
*Battle of Bhopal
*Battle of Lalsot
*Battle of Patan
*Battle of Fatehpur (1799)
